definitions.explanation_en: A surname of American origin, most notably associated with William Howard Taft, the 27th President of the United States and later Chief Justice of the United States Supreme Court.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个美国姓氏，最著名的是指威廉·霍华德·塔夫脱，美国第27任总统，后任美国最高法院首席大法官。
definitions.example_en: William Howard Taft was the only person in U.S. history to serve as both president and chief justice.
definitions.example_cn: 威廉·霍华德·塔夫脱是美国历史上唯一一位既担任过总统又担任过首席大法官的人。
